phrases.phrase:
Contains the base URL for VATSIM Connect. Endpoints are derived from this URL as follows: 
  • GET /oauth/authorize
  • POST /oauth/token
  • GET /api/user
If we wanted to access the email, we would use the string: data.personal.email.
If we wanted to access the full name, we would use the string: data.personal.full_name.

The homepage callback URL is used to notify the homepage of a new client being created. It sends a post request to the specified endpoint containing the CID and Board (Forum) ID of the user in question.
Defines the scopes for the OAuth flow. Must be space separated.
Configure the VATSIM Germany Authentication Plugin.
